      • calc

        public int calc(byte[] block,
       int from,
       int to)
        Description copied from interface: CRC8
        Calculates a CRC8 from the given data block.
        Specified by:
        calc in interface CRC8
        Parameters:
        block - the array from which the CRC is calculated
        from - the initial index of the range to be copied, inclusive
        to - the final index of the range to be copied, exclusive. (This index may lie outside the array.)
        Returns:
        the calculated CRC8 (8-bit)

      • calc

        public int calc(byte[] block,
       int from,
       int to,
       int initial)
        Description copied from interface: CRC8
        Calculates a CRC8 from the given data block.
        Specified by:
        calc in interface CRC8
        Parameters:
        block - the array from which the CRC is calculated
        from - the initial index of the range to be copied, inclusive
        to - the final index of the range to be copied, exclusive. (This index may lie outside the array.)
        initial - the initial CRC value (normally 0)
        Returns:
        the calculated CRC8 (8-bit)

        public int calc(java.io.InputStream stream,
       int length,
       int initial)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: CRC8
        Calculates a CRC8 from the given InputStream. Note that this function may return before count has been reached if an end of stream occurred.
        Specified by:
        calc in interface CRC8
        Parameters:
        stream - the stream to calculate the CRC8 from
        length - the number of bytes to read
        initial - the initial CRC value (normally 0)
        Returns:
        the calculated CRC8 (8-bit)
